channel.title: Emerald Heights Survival Server
channel.description: The Emerald Heights Minecraft Server is a great conglomerate of friendly players and helpful staff. We, the staff, strive to aid you in any way we can. On our server we have a variety of plugins and games ranging from Spleef to Paintball to a Mob Arena to a giant maze. We are a full fledged survival server. Come and check us out on our server at mc.emeraldheights.biz! Also don't forget to sign up on our website at www.emeraldheights.biz, you will immediately be promoted to Cobble by registering. Hope to see you there!
